voxatrace/com.musicmuni.voxatrace.calibra.common/SignalUtils

SignalUtils

object SignalUtils

Signal processing utility functions.

Ported from native/src/calibra/core/common/SignalUtils.cpp for the "Kotlin-max, C-min" migration.

Note: FFT-based functions (getLagInSamples) remain in C++ due to Essentia dependency.
